history.proof: intros. unfold Sup_seq. destruct (ex_sup_seq u) as [lu Hu]. qsimpl use: is_sup_seq_unique. qsimpl use: is_sup_seq_unique,is_sup_seq_ext. qsimpl use: is_sup_seq_unique,is_sup_seq_ext. hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> Rbar H : forall n : nat, u n = v n lu : Rbar Hu : is_sup_seq u lu Unable to unify "Sup_seq ?M2368 = ?M2369" with "proj1_sig (exist (fun l : Rbar => is_sup_seq u l) lu Hu) = proj1_sig (ex_sup_seq v)".

In environment H0 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l u, v : nat -> Rbar H : forall n : nat, u n = v n lu : Rbar Hu : is_sup_seq u lu x : Rbar i : is_sup_seq u x x0 : Rbar i0 : is_sup_seq v x0 Unable to unify "is_sup_seq v lu" with "x = x0".

In environment H2 : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_sup_seq u l -> is_sup_seq v l H1 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l u, v : nat -> Rbar H : forall n : nat, u n = v n lu : Rbar Hu : is_sup_seq u lu x : Rbar i : is_sup_seq u x x0 : Rbar i0 : is_sup_seq v x0 Unable to unify "u ?M2990 = v ?M2990" with "x = x0".

original: intros v u H. unfold Sup_seq. destruct (ex_sup_seq u) as [lu Hu]. apply is_sup_seq_unique. apply is_sup_seq_ext with (v:=v) (l:=lu). intro n. apply H.
